original_text: When God made the world and everything, he rested after he had finished his work. It is the same for everyone who goes to God's place of rest. They too will rest. They will no longer need to work.
korean_text: 이미 그의 안식에 들어간 자는 하나님이 자기의 일을 쉬심과 같이 그도 자기의 일을 쉬느니라

sentences.original_text: he rested after he had finished his work
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 일을 마친 후에 쉬셨다

sentences.original_text: It is the same for everyone
who goes to God's place of rest
They will no longer need to work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 일할 필요가 없을 것이다
